content: And I think we started to talk about that today, whether you travel one time per year with Reserve, one time per week with CLEAR Plus, PreCheck stand-alone, PreCheck together at CLEAR Plus, PreCheck with the other tools like Home to Gate, there's so much we can be doing to make the travel experience safer and easier on behalf of the American travelers. And when you look at the opportunity to bring CLEAR to the top 60 to 75 airports in the U.S., I think I said before that really is our focus, you see the experience that American travelers are having through CLEAR Plus lanes and it's meaningful from a predictability.
